text: Dharam Pal Gulati (27 March 1923 â€“ 3 December 2020), also known as Mahashay Dharampal Gulati, was an Indian businessman, and founder and CEO of MDH (Mahashian Di Hatti; ), an Indian spice company. He was known as the 'spice- king'. He was awarded the Padma Bhushan in 2019. He was known for being the founder and CEO of MDH. Gulati died on 3 December 2020 at a hospital in Delhi of a cardiac arrest at the age of 97. ==Notes== ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Indian businesspeople Category:Indian philanthropists
title: Dharampal Gulati
